text-summary: {{userName}} has invited you to join MailTag. Email Tracking: Unlimited real-time email tracking, Email Scheduling: Make your emails arrive at the perfect time, every time., Email Pings: Automate your email follow-up process.
email-begin-text: I just started using MailTag. I think you should check it out.
